title: Portfolio
summary: This website that I built to showcase my skills and present my profile.
description: I wanted to build a website that would represent me and showcase my skills and my profile. I decided to code my own website from scratch, using React, Vite and TypeScript.

title: TaskApp
summary: I crafted a task application allowing smooth daily organization.
description: I decided to code a task app that would be simple, straightforward and efficient. I used Node.js, Express.js and MySQL2 to build it from scratch.

title: Password Generator
summary: I crafted a password generator offering multiple generation choices.
description: In my quest and passion for programming, I coded a password generator using Python that allows users to choose from multiple generation options.
